mapper.sql:
from category where status != 2
and lower(name) like '%${name}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category(name, status, parentCategoryId, categoryOrder) VALUE (#{name}, #{status}, #{categoryOrder}, #{categoryOrder})
mapper.update: update category set status = 2 where id in (${ids})
update category set status = #{status}, name = #{name}, categoryOrder = #{categoryOrder} where id = #{id}
